sections.title: Gnostic Symbols of the Self
sections.thesis: Gnostic motifs as symbolic approaches to the Self, including wisdom figures and paradox.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A symbolic-religious current whose images of knowledge and paradox can be read as approaches to psychic totality.
The archetype of wholeness and psychic totality that orders life beyond the ego standpoint.
The tension of contrary psychic tendencies whose containment can generate transformation.
